name: Thora the Explorer
description:
When Nidhogg threatens to destroy the world, will you be the one to save it?

A "hard-as-nails" platformer made during a game jam between 3 people. Inspired by Norse mythology and other hard platformers like How To Be The Guy and 1001 Spikes, Thora the Explorer has a maxmimun High Score, but an infinitely low score.  Can you beat the game with a positive score?

CONTROLS
This game REQUIRES a gamepad to play.  
Left Analog - Move
A - Jump/Double Jump
B - Punch
X - Dash
Y - Uppercut

CREDITS
Jared Hahn (@Element_105) - Programming, Design & Music 
Catie McClean - Character Art, Additional Design
Tristan Kennedy - Environmental Art, Additional Design
